items.title: What is Bootstrap?
items.content: Bootstrap is a powerful open-source CSS framework that helps developers create responsive, mobile-first websites with ready-to-use components and utilities.

items.title: How does an Accordion work?
items.content: An Accordion organizes content into collapsible sections. Clicking a header expands its content while collapsing the others, providing a clean and interactive layout.

items.title: Why use Bootstrap Accordion?
items.content: Bootstrap Accordion is easy to implement and offers pre-designed styles. It improves user experience by structuring content in an interactive and space-saving way.

items.title: How to implement Accordions?
items.content: In Bootstrap, use the Accordion component to create collapsible sections. Customize it with classes and attributes for specific behavior.
